Welcome to Bing2YT!

Instantly skip Bing's embedded player and go directly to the original YouTube video.

Bing2YT is a browser extension that enhances Bing video search by instantly redirecting video results to YouTube. Instead of watching embedded or limited previews, users are taken straight to the original YouTube source with full features, recommendations and playback controls.

  • Instant YouTube redirects from Bing video results
  • Customisable settings
  • Search on YouTube directly from Bing
  • Built-in access to updates and changelog
